testcase.name: DBA.TR15
testcase.description: DBA.TR15: If the context identifier scheme is http://standards.iso.org/iso/17442, all context identifiers must be equal to the value of the field gsd:LegalEntityIdentifierOfReportingEntity.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: Not all context identifiers must be equal to the value of the field gsd:LegalEntityIdentifierOfReportingEntity.
